comment: Value of the ` _lcm ` function. ` ( _lcm `` Z ) ` is the least common multiple of the integers contained in the finite subset of integers ` Z ` . If at least one of the elements of ` Z ` is ` 0 ` , the result is defined conventionally as ` 0 ` . (Contributed by AV, 21-Apr-2020.) (Revised by AV, 16-Sep-2020.)
